alert.note: Alert for Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 6:08PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lanier and northeastern Lowndes Counties through 645 PM EST... At 607 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Lakeland to near Moody Air Force Base. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Moody Air Force Base, Meigs, Courthouse, Greenwood, Barretts and Hansell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
